name: qucat-circuit-generator
description: A project for generating and testing circuits

scripts.test: cp src/gui/renderers/GetImage.js src/gui/renderers/origGetImage.js && cp tests/testGetImage.js src/gui/renderers/GetImage.js && mocha --require tests/setup.js 'tests/**/*.test.js' && mv src/gui/renderers/origGetImage.js src/gui/renderers/GetImage.js
scripts.copy: cp -r assets dist/assets && cp src/gui/gui.html dist/
scripts.build: npm run bundle && npm run copy
